definitions.definition: Any moisture from the atmosphere condensed by cool bodies upon their surfaces.
Moisture in the air that settles on plants, etc in the morning or evening, resulting in drops .
An instance of such moisture settling on plants, etc.
examples: There was a heavy dew this morning.

definitions.definition: Anything that falls lightly and in a refreshing manner.
An emblem of morning , or fresh vigour .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Any moisture from the atmosphere condensed by cool bodies upon their surfaces.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Moisture in the air that settles on plants, etc in the morning or evening, resulting in drops .
( countable , but see usage notes ) An instance of such moisture settling on plants, etc.
( figurative ) Anything that falls lightly and in a refreshing manner.
( figurative ) An emblem of morning , or fresh vigour .
